title: Counting of lattices on up to three reducible elements
abstract:
In 2002 Thakare, Pawar and Waphare counted non-isomorphic lattices on n
elements, containing exactly two reducible elements. In this paper, we count
the non-isomorphic lattices on n elements, containing exactly three reducible
elements. This work is in respect of Birkhoff's open problem of enumerating all
finite lattices on n elements.
